tool_description: Processes raw atmospheric data to create engineered features including lagged variables, moving averages, seasonal components, and derived meteorological parameters for machine learning models.

input_data.description: Raw atmospheric measurement data as formatted strings

lag_periods.description: Time lags to create in number of time steps

error_messages: Data length mismatch: Input data and timestamps arrays must have equal length.
Insufficient data: At least 50 data points required for meaningful feature engineering.
Invalid lag periods: Lag periods must be positive integers less than data length.
Invalid window sizes: Moving window sizes must be positive integers.
Data format error: Input data must contain numeric atmospheric measurements.
Memory limitation: Feature combination results in too many features for processing.
usage: Provide raw atmospheric data with timestamps. Configure lag periods and moving windows based on forecast horizon needs. Enable seasonal and derived features for comprehensive modeling.

feature_matrix.description: Engineered feature matrix with all generated features

feature_names.description: Names and descriptions of all engineered features

valid_samples.description: Number of samples with complete feature values
